text: @realDonaldTrump @nytimes @SecAzar FAKE DONNIE REBUTTAL... you did nothing after shutting down Chinese flights...sat on your thumbs and fiddled like Nero whilst a pandemic roared around you!You didn’t stop Chinese 400,000+ came in AFTER your ‘ban’!Now it has come to light that original Coronavirus came from Europe
